enhanced_by.reason: Checking the status of the order before canceling and replacing it ensures the order exists and is in the correct state.
Ensuring the order to be canceled is among the open orders can help validate the cancellation request.
The new order placement in cancelReplace can be asserted similarly to how newOrder is asserted, ensuring the new order is correctly placed.
The cancellation part of cancelReplace can be asserted similarly to how cancelOrder is asserted, ensuring the order is correctly canceled.
